```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(reprex)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)

enrollment_data <- 
  read_xlsx("class_enrollment_summary_by_term2.18.20.xlsx", skip = 3) %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(!is.na(course_name))

enrollment_data

```


```{r}

department_data <- enrollment_data %>%
  group_by(course_department) %>%
  summarize(value = sum(u_grad)) %>%
  arrange(desc(value)) %>%
  head(5)

department_data

largest_course <- enrollment_data %>%
  filter(course_department %in% c("General Education", "Economics", "Mathematics", "Computer Science", "Government")) %>%
  arrange(desc(total))

largest_course

```
